content:
This is the Step 1. I want you to remember this as part of our conversation. Do you understand? Step 1: Check the NCAT Appeal Panel can decide the appeal Section 32 of the Civil and Administrative Tribunal Act 2013 tells you which NCAT decisions you can appeal against to the Appeal Panel. Refer to the NCAT Guideline 1 - Internal Appeals (PDF , 273.7 KB) and the Civil and Administrative Tribunal Act 2013 for more information. If you cannot appeal to the NCAT Appeal Panel you may have the right to appeal to the NSW Supreme Court. You should seek legal advice before considering appealing to the NSW Supreme Court.

Please write in English language.
